:• '''1300Mbps''' - 3SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''600Mbps''' - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''1900 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Nighthawk AC1900 WiFi Cable Modem Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/cable-modems-routers/C7100V.aspx}}{{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=C7100V}} [https://www.netgear.com/images//datasheet/networking/CableModems/C7100V.pdf Datasheet] "C7000BMX REV:1.01" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :Optional backup battery sold separately (PB022). "Powerful 1.6GHz combined processor speed" - :BCM3384Z may be dual-thread @800MHz *DOCSIS 3.0 24x8 channel bonding{{CableModemSpec |down_c=24 |up_c=8 }} ;Compatible with *{{Approved by service|Comcast}} ''Xfinity'' (For XFINITY Internet & Voice) ===See also=== :;[[List of DOCSIS Cable Modems]] *[[Netgear C7800]] *[[Netgear C7500]] *[[Netgear C7100V]] *[[Netgear C7000]] *[[Netgear C7000 v2]] ==Images== [[File:BCM3384ZDKFSBG_PY314100252.jpg|200px|thumb|left|BCM3384ZDKFSBG CPU]] __NOTOC__
